## GridLayout (component)

The GridLayout component displays the nested participants in a grid where every participants has the same size.

### Import

```typescript
import { GridLayout } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

## Usage

```tsx
<LiveKitRoom>
  <GridLayout tracks={tracks}>
    <ParticipantTile />
  </GridLayout>
<LiveKitRoom>
```

| Property                                                          | Modifiers | Type                                                                                              | Description |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| [children](./react//components-react.gridlayoutprops.children.md) |           | React.ReactNode                                                                                   |             |
| [tracks](./react//components-react.gridlayoutprops.tracks.md)     |           | [TrackReferenceOrPlaceholder](./core//components-core.trackreferenceorplaceholder.md)<!-- -->\[\] |             |
